title: Augusta County: Ginnie Ott to Enos Ott, December 15, 1864
summary: In this letter to her husband, Ginnie informs Enos of Henry's continued stay at home, the impending marriage between Mr. Steele and Miss Annie McNutt, and the status of her attempts to have Enos's hat and boots made.
keywords: Agriculture, Desertion/Leave, Home Front, American Civil War
